ref: 9734 *maṇigranthi ʻ wrist ʼ. 2. ʻ bracelet ʼ. [Primary mng. is ʻ wrist ʼ (→ Tam. maṇikaṭṭu ʻ wrist ʼ, Tu. &ucircle ʻ wrist -- bone ʼ); mng. ʻ bracelet ʼ due to association with maṇí -- 1. It replaces maṇibandha -- m. (with similar double mngs.) ʻ wrist ʼ Suśr., ʻ ornament ʼ Kālid. <-> maṇi -- 2, granthí -- ]
H. mangaṭ f. ʻ wrist, ankle, pastern ʼ,
